title: ggplot2 Vignette
text: sure uncomment execute two lines code. enable utilize developmental versions package.

title: ggplot2 Vignette
ggplot2 Vignette
ggplot2 Vignette
code: df <- data.frame(   ID = 1:5,   Name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Carol", "Dave", "Eve"),   Age = c(25, 30, 22, 35, 28),   Group = c("A", "B", "C", "B", "A") )

title: ggplot2 Vignette
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(   data = iris,   mapping = aes(x = Sepal.Length, fill = Species) ) +   geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +   scale_fill_dune_d(name = "harkonnen2") ggplot(   data = df,   mapping = aes(x = Name, y = Age, color = Group) ) +   geom_col(linewidth = 3, fill = "white") +   scale_color_dune_d(name = "fermen2")

title: ggplot2 Vignette
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(data.frame(x = rnorm(10000), y = rnorm(10000)),   mapping = aes(x = x, y = y) ) +   geom_hex() +   scale_fill_dune_c(name = "harkonnen") #> Warning: Computation failed in `stat_binhex()`. #> Caused by error in `compute_group()`: #> ! The package "hexbin" is required for `stat_bin_hex()`. ggplot(   data = iris,   mapping = aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Width, color = Sepal.Length) ) +   geom_point(size = 2) +   scale_color_dune_c(name = "sandworm")

what: Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune
title: Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune
text: {Rdune} package offers collection color palettes inspired â€˜Duneâ€™, designed use data visualizations graphics {ggplot2}. structure code creative inspiration drawn {PrettyCols}, {wesanderson}, {MetBrewer}, {PNWColors} packages. Colors selected using {eyedroppeR}. See https://nvietto.github.io/Rdune/ full documentation.

title: Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune

Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune

what: â€œMay thy knife chip and shatterâ€
title: Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(   data = iris,   mapping = aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species) ) +   geom_point(size = 2) +   scale_color_dune_d(name = "maythyknifechipandshatter")

title: Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune
code: library(ggplot2)  ggplot(   data.frame(x = rnorm(1000), y = rnorm(1000)),   aes(x = x, y = y) ) +   geom_hex() +   theme_minimal() +   scale_fill_dune_c(name = "atreides3") +   labs(x = "X-axis", y = "Y-axis", fill = "Legend")

what: Rdune: 'Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune' â€” Rdune-package
title: Rdune: 'Creates Color Palettes Inspired by Dune' â€” Rdune-package
text: Enables use color palettes inspired 'Dune' movies. palettes compatible 'ggplot2'. See Wickham (2016) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-24277-4  details 'ggplot2'.

title: Creates color palettes inspired by 'Dune' â€” dune_palette
Creates color palettes inspired by 'Dune' â€” dune_palette
text: name Name palette. Run names(dune_palettes) view options. n Number desired colors: requested number colors exceeds available palette, additional colors automatically interpolated. number colors (n) specified, default length palette used. type Specify either "continuous" "discrete". Use "continuous" want automatically interpolate colors.

title: Creates color palettes inspired by 'Dune' â€” dune_palette
